meta.name: lodash
meta.narrative: Lodash is the most popular JavaScript utility library with massive adoption. While commit activity has slowed (John-David Dalton is the primary maintainer), it remains one of the most downloaded npm packages. This is a mature, stable library that doesn't need frequent updates - a good test of the maturity factor in the scoring model.

expected.notes: Mature utility library with low commit velocity but massive adoption. Tests the maturity factor - high downloads + low activity should not be penalized as heavily as true abandonment. Score may be higher than other healthy packages due to bus factor = 1 and stale releases (381 days since last publish).
